\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Class for creating a Unix-\/domain server. 

Objects of this class bind and listen on Unix-\/domain ports for connections. Normally, a server thread creates one of these and blocks on the call to accept incoming connections. The call to accept creates and returns a \doxylink{unix__stream__socket_8h_a9ef255814a63d8a8440c5b9fd3564825}{unix\+\_\+stream\+\_\+socket} which can then be used for the actual communications.
